summary: THE POWER DOOR LOCKS STOPPED WORKING IN OUR FAMILIES 2005 DODGE CARAVAN. AFTYER DOING SOME RESEARCH ONLINS I'VE FOUND THIS HAS HAPPENED TO OTHER CONSUMERS WHOM OWN THE SAME VEHICLE YEAR MAKE AND MODEL. THIS IS NOT A PROBLEM THAT IS FIXED BY JUST SIMPLY REPLACING A BLOWN FUSE BUT IT SEEMS THAT IT IS A COMPUTER PROBLEM. WE HAVE SMALL CHILDREN WHOM COULD OPEN A DOOR THAT IS NOT LOCKED. *TR
